description: Our AI-powered system helps you create personalized, human-sounding review requests that actually work—without losing the personal touch that makes your business special.

key_features.title: Smart Personalization
key_features.description: AI analyzes your business, customers, and context to create review requests that feel genuinely personal and human.

key_features.title: Context-Aware Content
key_features.description: Creates different messages for different situations - service completion, product purchase, or event attendance.

key_features.title: Review Writing Assistance
key_features.description: Helps customers express their thoughts better with AI-powered suggestions while keeping reviews authentic.

key_features.title: Performance Optimization
key_features.description: Learns from your results and continuously improves your review request strategies over time.

key_features.title: Ethical AI Approach
key_features.description: Designed to enhance human connection, not replace it. Helps you be more personal while staying authentic.

key_features.title: Grammar & Style Enhancement
key_features.description: AI can polish grammar and improve clarity while preserving the customer's authentic voice and message.

how_it_works.title: Understand Your Business
how_it_works.description: AI learns about your business type, services, customer base, and review goals to provide relevant suggestions.

how_it_works.title: Analyze Customer Context
how_it_works.description: Considers the customer's experience, relationship with your business, and what they're most likely to review.

how_it_works.title: Generate Personalized Content
how_it_works.description: Creates review requests that feel personal, relevant, and authentic to each customer situation.

how_it_works.title: Learn and Improve
how_it_works.description: Tracks performance and adjusts strategies to continuously improve your review collection success rates.

best_practices.title: Keep It Personal
best_practices.description: Use AI to enhance your personal touch, not replace it. Always review and customize AI suggestions to match your voice.

best_practices.title: Perfect Your Timing
best_practices.description: Send review requests when the experience is fresh but not overwhelming. AI helps identify optimal timing windows.

best_practices.title: Focus on Quality
best_practices.description: Target customers who had positive experiences. AI works best with satisfied customers who are likely to leave good reviews.

best_practices.title: Test and Learn
best_practices.description: Experiment with different AI-generated approaches and let the system learn what works best for your specific business.
